description: I'm Kymbat, from Serbia. I am a passionate frontend developer dedicated to crafting modern, responsive, and high-performance web applications with precision and creativity.

about_me.title: About Me
about_me.description: MBA graduate from a British university, passionate about frontend development. Experienced in React and modern web technologies, I focus on creating intuitive and high-performance user interfaces.

weather_app.title: Weather App
weather_app.description: Get real-time weather updates and forecasts for any location worldwide.

currency_converter.title: Currency Converter
currency_converter.description: Convert between multiple currencies with live exchange rates and instant calculations.

to_do_list.title: To-Do List
to_do_list.description: Manage your daily tasks efficiently with an intuitive and user-friendly task manager.

expense_tracker.title: Expense Tracker
expense_tracker.description: Track and analyze your spending habits with visual insights and budget management.

mini_shop.title: Mini Shop
mini_shop.description: Browse products, filter by categories, search items, and complete purchases seamlessly.
